title: Thor thunders into MTB with Aaron Gwin & the all-new 2022 Assist collection
content:
Many MTB riders have some interest in motocross too, so most of us have at least heard of Thor clothing and gear. Thor has been making motocross apparel since 1968, and they’ve finally decided to jump into the MTB world… in a big way! To launch their first ever bike line, they’ve sponsored DH racing […]

The post Thor thunders into MTB with Aaron Gwin & the all-new 2022 Assist collection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
